column4: hey everyone, my ubuntu is totally useless. i'm very frustrated. it won't load past the login screen. can anyone help me? I don't want windows anymore!! >.<
do you have a laptop or desktop?
i have a toshiba sattelite P10. laptop
Does it give you any errors?
it loads everything until nautiulus i think, no errors, it fails to load any kind of useable GUI past the login screen
i get a background image at most
can you still type in a terminal after it crashes or does it lock up the entire laptop?
it doesnt crash or anything, i just doesnt load anything, how can i get to the terminal? is there a keyboard shortcut?
that should take you to a terminal
okay, but what do i do then?
login and type sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg
okay, may i PM you from here on? my computers are in 2 different rooms i will have trouble keeping track of this conversation
kalin: you can have multiple x sessions though. use something like startx --:1 to start it in a different terminal
